introduction.purpose: This document specifies the software requirements for the Calculator Demo App, a comprehensive React Native application that provides advanced mathematical calculation capabilities with a modern, user-friendly interface.
introduction.scope: The Calculator Demo App is a cross-platform mobile application built with React Native that offers basic arithmetic operations, advanced mathematical functions, scientific calculator capabilities, expression evaluation with parentheses support, and modern dark-themed UI.

definitions.PEMDAS: Parentheses, Exponents, Multiplication, Division, Addition, Subtraction
definitions.BODMAS: Brackets, Orders, Division, Multiplication, Addition, Subtraction

overall_description.product_perspective: The Calculator Demo App is a standalone mobile application that operates independently without requiring external services or network connectivity. It is designed to run on both iOS and Android platforms using React Native framework.

core_functions: Basic Arithmetic: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division
Advanced Operations: Exponentiation, square root, absolute value
Scientific Functions: Trigonometric (sin, cos, tan), logarithmic (ln, log₁₀)
Expression Evaluation: Support for complex mathematical expressions with parentheses
user_interface_functions: Display Management: Dual-row display (operation and result)
Error Management: Comprehensive error handling and user feedback
State Management: Calculator state persistence during operations

user_characteristics.technical_level: Basic to intermediate mobile device users
user_characteristics.accessibility: Touch-friendly interface with clear visual feedback

constraints: Memory: Efficient state management for complex expressions
UI/UX: Dark theme with consistent styling
Testing: Comprehensive unit test coverage (85+ tests)

basic_arithmetic_operations.description: The system shall perform addition operations with two or more numbers
The system shall perform subtraction operations with two or more numbers
The system shall perform multiplication operations with two or more numbers
The system shall perform division operations with two or more numbers
The system shall handle decimal number inputs and calculations
The system shall display results with appropriate precision

advanced_mathematical_functions.description: The system shall calculate square roots of positive numbers
The system shall calculate squares of numbers (x²)
The system shall calculate cubes of numbers (x³)
The system shall calculate absolute values of numbers
The system shall calculate factorials of non-negative integers
The system shall perform exponentiation operations (x^y)
The system shall calculate exponential functions (10^x)

scientific_functions.description: The system shall calculate sine, cosine, and tangent functions
The system shall calculate natural logarithm (ln) of positive numbers
The system shall calculate base-10 logarithm (log₁₀) of positive numbers
The system shall integrate mathematical constants (π)

expression_evaluation.description: The system shall evaluate mathematical expressions with parentheses
The system shall support nested parentheses up to 10+ levels
The system shall handle implicit multiplication (e.g., 2(3+4) → 2*(3+4))
The system shall support adjacent parentheses (e.g., (2+3)(4+5))
The system shall follow proper order of operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS)
The system shall validate parentheses balance and report mismatched parentheses

user_interface_operations.description: The system shall provide a clear, dual-row display (operation and result)
The system shall support touch-based button interactions
The system shall provide visual feedback for button presses
The system shall support sign toggle functionality (+/-)
The system shall provide clear/reset functionality
The system shall display current operation status

error_handling.description: The system shall detect and report mathematical errors (division by zero, negative square roots)
The system shall validate input parameters for mathematical functions
The system shall provide clear error messages to users
The system shall allow recovery from error states
The system shall handle invalid expressions gracefully

performance_requirements.description: Calculation response time shall be less than 100ms for standard operations
Complex expression evaluation shall complete within 500ms
Application startup time shall be less than 2 seconds
Memory usage shall remain under 50MB during normal operation

usability_requirements.description: The interface shall be intuitive for users with basic mobile device experience
Button sizes shall be appropriate for touch interaction (minimum 44px)
Text shall be clearly readable with appropriate contrast
The interface shall provide consistent visual feedback

reliability_requirements.description: The application shall handle edge cases without crashing
The application shall maintain state consistency during operations
The application shall recover gracefully from error conditions
The application shall provide accurate mathematical results

compatibility_requirements.description: The application shall run on iOS 12.0 and later
The application shall run on Android API level 21 and later
The application shall support both portrait and landscape orientations
The application shall adapt to different screen sizes

security_requirements.description: The application shall not store sensitive user data
The application shall not require network permissions
The application shall operate in offline mode

user_interface_layout.description: Header section with application title and developer information
Dual-row display area for operations and results
Special operations section with mathematical functions
Basic operations and number input section
Consistent dark theme throughout the application

button_layout_organization.description: Special operations arranged in three rows: Row 1: x², √, |x|, C; Row 2: x³, n!, log₁₀, exp; Row 3: sin, cos, tan, ln
Basic operations and numbers arranged in five rows: Row 1: (, ), π, ÷; Row 2: 7, 8, 9, ×; Row 3: 4, 5, 6, -; Row 4: 1, 2, 3, +; Row 5: +/-, 0, ., =

visual_design_requirements.description: Dark theme with consistent color scheme
Rounded corners and modern button styling
Appropriate font sizes and weights for readability
Responsive design for different screen sizes

system_features.calculator_core_engine: The application includes a comprehensive mathematical calculation engine that supports basic arithmetic operations with proper precedence, advanced mathematical functions with input validation, expression parsing and evaluation with recursive descent algorithm, and error handling and user feedback mechanisms.
system_features.expression_parser: Advanced expression evaluation system featuring parentheses support with nesting validation, implicit multiplication handling, operator precedence enforcement, and syntax validation and error reporting.
system_features.user_interface_system: Modern, responsive interface with touch-optimized button layout, real-time display updates, visual feedback for user interactions, and error state management and recovery.
system_features.state_management: Comprehensive state management system including calculator state persistence, operation history tracking, error state handling, and input validation and sanitization.

assumptions: Users have basic familiarity with mobile device touch interfaces
The application will be used primarily for mathematical calculations
Users expect immediate response to input actions
dependencies: Jest testing framework for unit testing

functional_acceptance: All mathematical operations produce accurate results
Expression evaluation handles complex nested expressions correctly
Error handling provides appropriate user feedback
User interface responds correctly to all touch interactions
non_functional_acceptance: Application performance meets specified response time requirements
User interface is intuitive and accessible
Application operates reliably across supported platforms
Code quality meets established standards (linting passes)
testing_requirements: Unit test coverage for all core functionality
Integration testing for user interface components

technical_improvements: Enhanced error handling and recovery mechanisms
Accessibility improvements for users with disabilities

software_requirements_specification.conclusion: This Software Requirements Specification defines the comprehensive requirements for the Calculator Demo App, a sophisticated mathematical calculation application built with React Native. The application successfully implements advanced mathematical functionality while maintaining an intuitive user interface and robust error handling capabilities. The application meets all specified functional and non-functional requirements, providing users with a powerful, reliable, and user-friendly mathematical calculation tool suitable for educational, professional, and personal use.
